citations.narrative:
There were accumulations of feces covering the floors of enclosures housing guinea pigs. Enclosures were last cleaned
over two weeks ago. Infrequent cleaning and sanitation exposes the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems.
Primary enclosures must be cleaned often enough to prevent accumulations of excreta, soiled bedding, and debris. In
addition, the enclosures must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks., Correct by May 2, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.31(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
There were accumulations of feces covering the floors of enclosures housing guinea pigs. Enclosures were last cleaned 
over two weeks ago. Infrequent cleaning and sanitation exposes the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. 
Primary enclosures must be cleaned often enough to prevent accumulations of excreta, soiled bedding, and debris. In 
addition, the enclosures must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks., Correct by May 2, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
